War saw the crab bor come at him. He pulled the dagger
from the bots side 
(hellbeast) and flipped backward. (im cooseing to
ignore jp's posted damage 
for my char here but iw ill acept in the other cases.)
He landed  behind him 
firing his wrist energy blasts. 
Proto took the shot from tankkor. He looked up one arm
still in aracnia. 
There was a hole in his stomach.miled as he healed
over. Little slower then 
usual do to the cold. (If you have ever seen
terminator 2 think of that.)  
The fist in aracnia spread out of it 20 spikes. (It
should shoot those 20 out 
of her chest. Exposing her spark. But ill wait till jp
posts.)
Famine watched 
as the needle penetrated hell beast.  It would take 3
seconds for the bot to 
collapse and his spark would  die in a minute. The
virus randomly changed. So 
they could never get a cure in time. He only has a
min. He yanked the needle 
out and fired on tankore. 
Peastelense  shot at any enemy he saw. He ran and 
tried to make a shield for apocalypse. 
Apocalypse formed a shield of talons 
from his arms. One gift not yet tried out. he defleted
a few blasts but one 
hit him in the shoulder sending shooting pain. HE
nodded to death and  death 
walked backward admiss the fire and swung down his
reaper at aracnias neck. 
While doing so apocalypse tried to grab her by the
next to hold her using his 
shield to block enemy fire.







--- JP3884@... wrote:
> Um, Can you space out your characters individual
> actions because this is 
> really confusing....Im sorry, I tried to post to it
> but I cant understand

> dose.
>
